UniprotID	Q9H1A3
Accession	Q9H1A3;Q8NBT8;Q9BWJ7;Q9H1A2;Q9Y390
EntryName	METL9_HUMAN
ProteinName	Protein-L-histidine N-pros-methyltransferase (EC 2.1.1.-) (DORA reverse strand protein) (DREV) (DREV1) (Methyltransferase-like protein 9) (hMETTL9)
GeneName	METTL9 DREV CGI-81
Length	318
Function	Protein-histidine N-methyltransferase that specifically catalyzes 1-methylhistidine (pros-methylhistidine) methylation of target proteins (PubMed:33563959, PubMed:34562450, PubMed:37015930, PubMed:37398635). Specifically methylates the second His of proteins with a His-x-His (HxH) motif (where 'x' is preferably a small amino acid), while exploiting the first one as a recognition signature (PubMed:37398635). Catalyzes methylation of target proteins such as S100A9, NDUFB3, SLC39A5, SLC39A7, ARMC6 and DNAJB12; 1-methylhistidine modification may affect the binding of zinc and other metals to its target proteins (PubMed:33563959, PubMed:34562450, PubMed:37015930, PubMed:37398635). Constitutes the main methyltransferase for the 1-methylhistidine modification in cell (PubMed:33563959).
Subcellular Location	Endoplasmic reticulum; Mitochondrion
Disorder	0.0050,0.0042,0.0047,0.0060,0.0057,0.0046,0.0041,0.0045,0.0055,0.0066,0.0068,0.0056,0.0057,0.0057,0.0075,0.0083,0.0091,0.0095,0.0148,0.0235,0.0398,0.0235,0.0227,0.0184,0.0205,0.0235,0.0494,0.0851,0.1048,0.1229,0.1229,0.1583,0.2918,0.2503,0.3117,0.2783,0.2541,0.2258,0.3249,0.3182,0.3215,0.3460,0.4541,0.5665,0.6806,0.5176,0.4541,0.3774,0.3087,0.3215,0.2951,0.3087,0.3117,0.1942,0.1583,0.2002,0.2258,0.1731,0.1791,0.1501,0.1028,0.0473,0.0281,0.0275,0.0281,0.0151,0.0171,0.0320,0.0531,0.0870,0.0835,0.0870,0.0433,0.0209,0.0214,0.0356,0.0356,0.0356,0.0356,0.0364,0.0454,0.0690,0.1399,0.1092,0.0592,0.0294,0.0313,0.0592,0.0313,0.0168,0.0163,0.0151,0.0088,0.0096,0.0163,0.0253,0.0165,0.0092,0.0092,0.0094,0.0061,0.0054,0.0054,0.0053,0.0076,0.0101,0.0115,0.0194,0.0191,0.0194,0.0209,0.0218,0.0227,0.0473,0.0704,0.0568,0.0294,0.0294,0.0300,0.0300,0.0646,0.1349,0.1759,0.0985,0.1048,0.1007,0.0618,0.0618,0.0555,0.0306,0.0581,0.1184,0.1251,0.0646,0.0631,0.0676,0.0835,0.1554,0.1349,0.1528,0.1643,0.0817,0.0765,0.0605,0.1206,0.1206,0.1229,0.2034,0.2193,0.2258,0.3149,0.2094,0.1476,0.1373,0.2645,0.2609,0.1449,0.1611,0.1759,0.1759,0.1731,0.1424,0.2292,0.2436,0.1881,0.1823,0.1881,0.1942,0.1501,0.1349,0.0676,0.0719,0.0734,0.0985,0.1007,0.0817,0.0817,0.0948,0.0835,0.0483,0.0494,0.0909,0.0605,0.0631,0.0631,0.0555,0.0592,0.0592,0.0592,0.0765,0.0662,0.1323,0.0719,0.1349,0.0870,0.0494,0.0494,0.0320,0.0334,0.0380,0.0341,0.0356,0.0380,0.0662,0.0389,0.0380,0.0817,0.0929,0.0483,0.0483,0.0269,0.0327,0.0300,0.0592,0.0306,0.0454,0.0780,0.0506,0.0463,0.0888,0.0967,0.1611,0.2328,0.2224,0.2224,0.2224,0.1349,0.0780,0.0543,0.0555,0.0349,0.0349,0.0734,0.0364,0.0320,0.0704,0.0414,0.0269,0.0473,0.0888,0.0518,0.0433,0.0414,0.0414,0.0218,0.0248,0.0364,0.0765,0.1251,0.1583,0.1528,0.1349,0.2224,0.1229,0.2094,0.2164,0.1914,0.2918,0.2541,0.2503,0.2541,0.3249,0.2541,0.2680,0.2715,0.2849,0.2951,0.3149,0.2164,0.1229,0.1070,0.1702,0.2224,0.2064,0.1852,0.1349,0.0765,0.0817,0.0618,0.0581,0.0555,0.0473,0.0258,0.0483,0.0
